titles: To the Right Worshipful the master, wardens, and assistants of the Company of Grocers The humble petition of Major Salloway.
notes: Place and date of publication from Wing.
A satire on Richard Salwey's imprisonment in the Tower and subsequent release.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Salwey, Richard, 1615-1685 --  Humor --  Early works to 1800.
